function_reachability: Is it impossible for function 'rand' to reach function 'atoi'?
Is it impossible for function 'randomWeight' to reach function 'main'?
Is there a call path from function 'main' to function 'printf'?
loop_reachability: Can the loop with condition 'i <= n' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'i <= n' always executed?
Can the loop with condition 'i <= n*n' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'i <= n*n' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i <= n' without passing through its header block?
Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i <= n*n' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Is variable 'maxWeight (line 3)' used after its definition?
Is variable 'maxWeight (line 5)' used after its definition?
liveness: Is variable 'k' live at the end of function 'main'?
Is variable 'argc' live at the end of function 'main'?
dead_code: Can the statement 'for (i = 1; i <= n; i++) {' be considered dead code?
Is this statement not dead: “printf ("Benchmark 1 [%d]\n", n);”?
